name: The Cyclops (Inflatables #01)
description:
“The Cyclops” is the first artwork of the “Inflatables” series. 

The series was inspired by Jeff Koons “Balloons” collection.
As a generative artist, I asked myself how to bend, stretch, squeeze and inflate multiple balloon like objects at once, to create an interesting new structure. The result is a series of unique artworks, entirely created and written in the programming language R (code).
